\selectlanguage{english}
\currentpdfbookmark{Declaration}{chap:declaration}
\section*{Declaration}\thispagestyle{empty}
    \label{chap:declaration}

    ``As author and creator of this work to hand, I confirm with my signature knowledge of the relevant copyright regulations governed by higher education acts (for example see \S\S 21, 46 and 57 UrhG (Austrian copyright law) as amended as well as \S 11 of the Statute on Studies Act Provisions / Examination Regulations of the UAS Technikum Wien).\\[\baselineskip]
    In particular I declare that I have made use of third-party content correctly, regardless what form it may have, and I am aware of any consequences I may face on the part of the degree program director if there should be evidence of missing autonomy and independence or evidence of any intent to fraudulently achieve a pass mark for this work (see \S 11 para. 1 Statute on Studies Act Provisions / Examination
    Regulations of the UAS Technikum Wien).\\[\baselineskip]
    I further declare that up to this date I have not published the work to hand nor have I presented it to another examination board in the same or similar form. I affirm that the version submitted matches the version in the upload tool.''
    \vspace{4\baselineskip}

    \begin{picture}(0,0)
        % Insert date and place here
        \put(10,5){\place, \today}
        % Insert your signature here
        \put(\signaturex,\signaturey){\includegraphics[width=0.3\textwidth]{\signaturepath}}
    \end{picture}
    \rule{5cm}{0.2pt}\hfill\rule{5cm}{0.2pt}\\
    \phantom{Datum }Place, Date\hfill Signature\hspace{15mm}
